select seq_member.nextval from dual
insert into member ( mem_no, mail, password, mem_id, name, birth, gender, phone ) values ( #{mem_no}, #{mail}, #{password}, #{mem_id}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: select bo.ex_no, ex.name_ko name, ex.image from ex_book bo, exercise ex where bo.mem_no = #{mem_no} and bo.ex_no = ex.ex_no
mapper.delete: delete from ex_book where mem_no = #{mem_no} and ex_no = #{ex_no}
